channel.title: RS2 Client hacking and GERMAN RUNESCAPE?
channel.description:
Oke, lets start from the beginning: I downloaded the runescape client. I unpacked it and used jackie to open client.class, changed [code]invokestatic java.net.InetAddress java.net.InetAddress.getLocalHost()[/code] to [code]invokestatic java.net.InetAddress java.net.InetAddress.getByName(java.lang.String)[/code] and above it i added ldc [code]"po4.epacsenur.com"[/code]. When i try to run the client, it gets till "connecting to update-server" and then it stops. It doesnt give me an error in the cmd screen (like when you try to run it without editing client.class) it just stops, it doesnt do anything. If someone knows what i should do / not do, please reply. I want to now it because once i can start the client normally, i want to start it with the parameter "german" instead of english. Cause, when you start it without any parameters (world, live, rc, lowmem, free, english/german) it say: [code]Usage: worldid, [live/office/local], [live/rc/wip], [lowmem/highmem], [free/memb ers], [english/german][/code] This would mean, Jagex is busy with a German runescape.
EDIT: [img]http://img72.imageshack.us/img72/1280/germanrunescape1lp.png[/img]
Like the idea? Well, help me and i'll help you.

item.title: RS2 Client hacking and GERMAN RUNESCAPE?
item.dc:creator: @Jorsa Jorsa
item.description:
@Jorsa wrote:

i know this topics a bit dead but i found this on the Jagex website

Our ambition for 2006 is to exceed 850,000 subscribers for RuneScape, [u]to take RuneScape into other non-english language markets[/u] and to develop further games using our technologies.

Read full topic

Its “po4.runescape.com”

LOL that shows u the dangers of copying and pasting off a tut. rs-resources change runescape to epacsenur[/quote]Haha lol, I overlooked that because I thought he had changed that himself (used to reinet where they always had anything but the real ‘R’ word :D)

item.title: RS2 Client hacking and GERMAN RUNESCAPE?
item.dc:creator: @danmazmanzcool danmazmanzcool
item.description:
@danmazmanzcool wrote:

[quote=“pimjong, post:1, topic:4827”]Oke, lets start from the beginning:
I downloaded the runescape client.
I unpacked it and used jackie to open client.class,
changed invokestatic java.net.InetAddress java.net.InetAddress.getLocalHost()
to invokestatic java.net.InetAddress java.net.InetAddress.getByName(java.lang.String)
and above it i added ldc "po4.epacsenur.com".
When i try to run the client, it gets till “connecting to update-server” and then it stops.
It doesnt give me an error in the cmd screen (like when you try to run it without editing client.class) it just stops, it doesnt do anything.
If someone knows what i should do / not do, please reply.
I want to now it because once i can start the client normally, i want to start it with the parameter “german” instead of english.
Cause, when you start it without any parameters (world, live, rc, lowmem, free, english/german) it say:

Usage: worldid, [live/office/local], [live/rc/wip], [lowmem/highmem], [free/memb ers], [english/german]
This would mean, Jagex is busy with a German runescape.

EDIT:

Like the idea?
Well, help me and i’ll help you.[/quote]

Your problem is so simple.

Its “po4.runescape.com”

LOL that shows u the dangers of copying and pasting off a tut. rs-resources change runescape to epacsenur

Read full topic
